request.description:
Shows all classes. Can be used as a search with multiple filters.

## Behavior:
   Only searches the current period
   Passing or=true as a filter makes the filter list become inclusive

## Filters:
  * school
    * school id
  * professor.name
    * professor name
  * professor.id
	* professor id
  * class.status
    * status id
    * For ghost classes, use 0.
  * class.name
    * class name
  * class.number
    * class number
  * class.meet_days
    * class meet_days
  * class.length
    * 1st Half
    * 2nd Half
    * Full Term
    * Custom

## Weights

  Weights are added as an array of weights one time through this route. They require name and weight. If is_points is false, they need to sum to 100. After a class has weights, the appropriate edit route needs to be used.
  
  This should only be used if the class is in the Weights status, and it will progress the class to the Assignments status.

## Required fields

name, 
number, 
meet_days, 
seat_count, 
class_start, 
class_end, 
is_enrollable, 
grade_scale,
is_editable, 
class_period_id, 
is_syllabus, 
is_points

## Optional fields

crn, 
credits, 
location, 
professor_id, 
class_type,
meet_start_time, 
meet_end_time,
campus

request.description:
Confirms that a class is ready to change stages from a stage that will not auto stage to the next step.

### Stages:
 * New Class -> [Syllabus, Weights]

Creates a class in the given class period.

## Defaults

grade_scale: A,90|B,80|C,70|D,60

## Required fields

name, 
number, 
meet_days, 
meet_start_time, 
meet_end_time,
seat_count, 
class_start, 
class_end, 
is_enrollable, 
is_editable, 
class_period_id, 
is_syllabus

## Optional fields

crn, 
credits, 
location, 
professor_id, 
class_type,
grade_scale, 
is_points
Denies that a class is valid, and will delete the class

request.description:
Shows all classes for a school. Lighter weight than get classes, mainly used for enrollment in a class. Can be used as a search with multiple filters.

   Only searches the current period
   Passing or=true as a filter makes the filter list become inclusive

  * class.name
    * class name
  * class.number
